lead_paragraph: While Angelique Kerber was winning her third straight match at the WTA Finals, she glanced courtside and noticed three famous spectators in the crowd — Chris Evert, Martina Navratilova and Monica Seles.

headline.print_headline: Kerber Savoring Her Rise to the Top of Women's Tennis
headline.main: Kerber Savoring Her Rise to the Top of Women's Tennis
